About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Graduate from the University of Manitoba, Canada. I am an expert in electrical protection design and simulation as well as power system analysis. I am also expert in power system modelling & simulation sofware packages such as PSCAD, PSSE and RTDS.

Manitoba Hydro International Ltd

Project

In this project i work with simulation and protection engineers at Manitoba Hydro International. Main objective was to test the accuracy and proper operation of protection relay model library developed by developed by the company. The workflow consisted of creating suitable test scenarios in PSCAD power system simulation software to evaluate the proper operation of protection relay models. The testing was carried out on Distance relays, Over-current relays, Directional over-current relays, Differential relays, Generator protection relays & DG Interconnection relays.

University of Manitoba

Research Fellow

During my work as a Research fellow and research assistant, I investigated the use of travelling wave based fault location in VSC-HVDC schemes,Implemented protection schemes for active distribution networks/micro-grids using PSCAD/EMTDC simulation environment,Developed a transient current detection sensor and validated using laboratory experiments and Validated the transient based protection method using hardware implementation and HIL simulation using RTDS

ERLPhase Power Technologies

Internship

During this internship, I simulated the protection methods for active distribution networks in PSCAD/EMTDC simulation software and Explored the use of communication protocols(IEC61850) for protection applications using RTDS simulator
